name: Sproutfolk Fronds
description: Common drop from Sproutfolk in forested zones; also appears in resource nodes within their camps. Used in early armor.

name: Omen Beast Components
description: Dropped from major Omen Beasts. Required for high-tier weapons and cosmetics.

name: Ironbloom Ore
description: Found in rocky outcrops and caves. Highlighted in Soul Mode. Used to upgrade early weapons.
